title: Golden Globes to Honor Sarah Jessica Parker With 2026 Carol Burnett Award
summary: And just like that, the lineup of honorees for the Globes' Golden Eve special is complete.
body: Sarah Jessica Parker has been named the 2026 Carol Burnett Award honoree, recognizing her contributions to the television industry both in front of and behind the camera. As previously announced, Dame Helen Mirren will receive the Cecil B. DeMille Award, the equivalent award recognizing contributions in film. Both awards will be presented on the new annual primetime special Golden Eve , airing on Thursday, Jan. 8, at 8 p.m. ET/PT on CBS and streaming on Paramount+. The special will air three days before the 83rd annual Golden Globes, which is set to air live on Sunday, Jan. 11. Related Golden Globes to Honor Helen Mirren With 2026 Cecil B. DeMille Award Golden Globes Find a Way to Make Room for Cecil B. DeMille & Carol Burnett Awards: A New Spin-Off Show Nikki Glaser Already Tapped to Return as Golden Globes Host for 2026 This marks the first time that women have claimed both awards in the six years that both have been presented. The Carol Burnett Award, created in 2019 and initially awarded to its namesake, has since been presented to Ellen DeGeneres, Norman Lear, Ryan Murphy and Ted Danson. “Sarah Jessica Parker’s career embodies the very spirit of the Carol B…
